data.name: Coloring Pixels - Landmarks 2 Pack
data.detailed_description:
Landmarks 2 Book

This Landmarks 2 Book brings 20 new, large images to Coloring Pixels, the second book of its kind, each image depicts more famous landmarks from all over the globe!

Sit back and travel the world!

Like the first Landmarks book, all images are the same large resolution of 200x150 so settle in for a lot of coloring!

Contents

The Landmarks 2 book unlocks the following images:

  • Angkor Wat - 200x150
  • Burj Khalifa - 200x150
  • Colosseum - 200x150
  • Eiffel Tower - 200x150
  • Golden Gate Bridge - 200x150
  • Grand Canyon - 200x150
  • Great Wall of China - 200x150
  • Kremlin - 200x150
  • La Sagrada Familia - 200x150
  • Machu Picchu - 200x150
  • Kaaba - 200x150
  • Moai - 200x150
  • Mount Rushmore - 200x150
  • Petra - 200x150
  • Statue of Liberty - 200x150
  • St. Basil's Cathedral - 200x150
  • St. Peter's Basilica - 200x150
  • Sydney Opera House - 200x150
  • Taj Mahal - 200x150
  • Parthenon - 200x150

data.short_description: This Landmarks 2 Book brings 20 new, large images to Coloring Pixels, the second book of its kind, each image depicts more famous landmarks from all over the globe!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
